message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $10,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. Can we meet in the middle at $7,250?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $7,250 is too low for me.  Could you do $9,000? I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value.
I understand you're looking for a higher price, but I'm still a bit far from $9,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $7,500. Can we discuss further?
